title: Planning a programme
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television film recording
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Lighting
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Production and direction
description: An introduction to the basic techniques of recording an event on camera. In the first section a humorous dramatization of a retirement ceremony shows how not to do it. The second section shows how these mistakes can be easily avoided by proper research and planning. A series of graphics is used to demostrate how the program-makers can organize the positioning of camera, lights and participants well in advance of filming. The tape ends with a shorter, punchier, much improved version of thr ceremony.
